entity.name: HAX The Web
entity.description: HAX The Web is an open source ubiquitous web development project created by The Pennsylvania State University. Primarily worked on in HAX Lab, a partnership between College of Arts & Architecture and College of Information Sciences and Technology. We are a group of researchers, developers, students, faculty and designers who are passionate about making the web more accessible, inclusive and ubiquitous for anyone regardless of ability.

projects.name: Web component monorepo
projects.description: A collection of web components that are used in the HAX ecosystem. These components are used to build the HAX editor, HAXcms and other projects.

projects.name: HAXcms PHP
projects.description: A PHP version of HAXcms, a headless CMS that is built on web components.

projects.name: HAXcms Nodejs
projects.description: A Nodejs version of HAXcms, a headless CMS that is built on web components.

projects.name: HAX CLI
projects.description: A CLI tool for creating HAX sites and web components.

projects.name: HAX The Web Issue Tracker
projects.description: A place to report issues and feature requests for HAX The Web projects.

channels.description: Donate to HAX The Web via Open Collective.

plans.name: Growth
plans.description: Our projects require constant management in order to sustain and grow. Please consider helping us continue to grow by building up funds to support student developers, bug bounties and more!

plans.name: HAX Lab student internship
plans.description: This will cover the cost of one student developer working for HAX Lab to complete a 240 hour requirement, while funding them to do so. HAX Lab students learn about modern web development by contributing to issues in the HAX ecosystem. These internships often are unfunded due to students just desiring to learn about the project. Funding students helps bring in more students that want to do this as a profession and have the space to grow while being financially supported.

plans.name: Goodwill plan
plans.description: Pay anything you wish to show your goodwill for the project and help HAX grow.
